## Available Devices (6 total)

| Device | IP Address       | Platform  | Role@Site    | Groups |
|--------|------------------|-----------|--------------|--------|
| R1     | 192.168.100.101 | cisco_ios | border@lab  | [test] ✅ |
| R2     | 192.168.100.102 | cisco_ios | border@lab  | [test] ✅ |
| R3     | 192.168.100.103 | cisco_ios | core@lab    | [test] ✅ |
| R4     | 192.168.100.104 | cisco_ios | core@lab    | [test] ✅ |
| SW1    | 192.168.100.105 | cisco_ios | access@lab  | [test] ✅ |
| SW2    | 192.168.100.106 | cisco_ios | access@lab  | [test] ✅ |

**Filters available**: `role:core/border/access`, `site:lab`, `group:test`, `platform:cisco_ios`.  
Example: "Check core devices" → `list_devices(role="core")` or use `smart_query("role:core", "version")`.

## R1 OSPF Status ✅

**Device**: R1 (192.168.100.101) | **Platform**: cisco_ios | **Role**: border@lab

| Metric              | Value                          | Status |
|---------------------|--------------------------------|--------|
| Process ID          | 1 (Router ID: 1.1.1.1)        | ✅     |
| Areas               | 1 (BACKBONE/0)                 | ✅     |
| Interfaces in Area 0| 3 (1 loopback)                 | ✅     |
| LSAs in Area 0      | 9                              | ✅     |
| SPF Executions      | 9 (last: 5d23h ago)            | ✅     |
| Neighbors/External  | 0 external LSAs                | ✅     |
| Redistribution      | BGP 65000 (subnets)            | ⚠️ Note|

**Summary**: OSPF is running normally in Area 0. No adjacency issues visible in process summary. Redistributing BGP routes.

### Detailed Output (show ip ospf)
```
Routing Process "ospf 1" with ID 1.1.1.1
Start time: 00:01:23.493, Time elapsed: 5d23h
Supports only single TOS(TOS0) routes
Supports opaque LSA

Supports Database Exchange Summary List Optimization (RFC 5243)

   bgp 65000, includes subnets in redistribution
Router is not originating router-LSAs with maximum metric
Initial SPF schedule delay 50 msecs
Minimum hold time between two consecutive SPFs 200 msecs

Maximum wait time for LSA throttle 5000 msecs

Number of opaque AS LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x000000

Number of areas transit capable is 0

Cisco NSF helper support enabled
```

**Next Steps?**  
- Check neighbors: `check ospf neighbors on R1`  
- Check interfaces: `check ospf interfaces on R1`  
- All good? ✅ No action needed.
